testcase.name: The user clicks on Edit button for a reservation.

testcase.name: Delete all waiting list requests
testcase.system-out: Given I access the "ui" site................................................passed When I navigate to the Wai List Requests page...............................passed Then I check if there are any waiting list requests, and if not I create one.passed And I navigate to the Wai List Requests page................................passed And I cancel all the wait list requests.....................................passed Then A message informing the user about no wait list found will be visible..passed And I log out...............................................................passed
